Articles.Content:
Welcome to E.G.G.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/hgoagig23ydosvi/E_G_G_.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/hgoagig23ydosvi/E_G_G_.craft?dl=0) Download Link

E.G.G. is the most advance Rover Ever to hit the Ksp spacecraft exchange. E.G.G. Is more than just a rover, it is a sentient being. Every time you want to drive E.G.G. is there for you with its 'Anti Roll Wings" technology. Wherever you want to Rove ,E.G.G. is there for you.

Specs:

Max Seating: 6

Recommended seating: 4

Top Speed: 20m/s

Max Turning Speed: 20m/s

Modes: 3

Compatible Planets: All

Braking Distance: Varies By Planet

Modes: (action group 1)

Egg Mode: The mode used for getting in and out of the Mobile Lab, on and off Celestial Bodies, and to roll around planets\*

Action Mode: The mode used to Rove and explore Celestial Bodies

Hibernation Mode: The mode used to recharge the batteries

leave question in your comments

BUY YOURS TODAY ONLY 97,754 Funds

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/vwSul)

\*Rolling on planets is ill-advised as it may lead to spontaneous disassembly

DONT TOUCH ANYTHING. THIS ROVER IS AS STURDY AND FRAGILE AS AN EGG. IF YOU TOUCH ANYTHING IT MAY RESULT IN SPONTANEOUS DISASSEMBLY!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-20T21:05:56Z" title="02/20/2015 09:05  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 20, 2015</time> by Penguinhero**
